channel.title: CVE Feed for WSO2 -- WSO2 API Manager
channel.description: The latest CVEs for WSO2 -- WSO2 API Manager

item.title: CVE-2023-6839|2024-10-08T14:14:43.216Z -- wso2 -- wso2%20api%20manager
item.description: Due to improper error handling, a REST API resource could expose a server side error containing an internal WSO2 specific package name in the HTTP response.
